welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chillum, the charming city known for its rich history and beautiful parks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our vibrant community has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: This terminal is used by various airlines, including Delta, United, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves American Airlines and Spirit Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves Delta Air Lines and United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
